text: Yara bale, niscaya allah‌ tini to mar‌iyama-tanaya masiha’, abasya'i tara kuphari kareche [1]. Athaca masiha balechilena, ‘he isara'ila-santanagana! Tomara amara raba o tomadera raba allahara ibadata kara.’ Niscaya ke'u allahara sathe sarika karale allaha tara jan'ya jannata abasya'i harama kare diyechena [2] ebam tara abasa habe jahannama. Ara yalemadera jan'ya kono sahayyakari ne'i
